aboutme.title: WHO AM I ?
aboutme.summary: Very sociable, smiling, motivated and dynamic, I am passionate about graphics and design, I master Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop and Lightroom. I also practice photography and special effects makeup in my spare time. After a BAC + 3 in Graphics and Design, I want to continue my studies on a 2-year master's degree specialized in artistic direction.
